items.summary: Update ONLY the post composer container at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1] to be visually smaller/more compact (reduced padding and vertical spacing), while keeping the composer usable.

Update ONLY the two post-type buttons at XPaths /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/button[1] and /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/button[2] so that text and photo posting are handled within a single unified composer flow (no separate/isolated composer experiences). The unified flow must still respect the existing Pro/Admin restriction for photo posting.
